messages.subject: Re: Sculpey clay
messages.msgSnippet: I love the whole site.  As a non-artist*, I don t even know what materials are available for my very artistic children and this site seems to have it all.  We
messages.messageBody:
I love the whole site. As a non-artist*, I don't even know what
materials are available for my very artistic children and this site
seems to have it all. We ordered a catalogue and we'll just sit
around looking at it discovering the world of art supplies. :-) This
year's Christmas will have an art theme, I'm sure.

Holly
2 COOL 4 SCHOOL
Homeschooling and Unschooling T-shirts
http://www.cafepress.com/2cool4school

*I used to be a non-mathematician too until I started unschooling so
I don't plan on being a non-artist forever.

--- In UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com, mirindia4@a... wrote:
> thaks holly,i'm going to have my boys check out the website in the
morning
> and see if they just want to order it, instead of getting it from
the store. pat
>
>

I'd be willing to bet the Michael's carries now, and I just saw it at Target
the other day. I got mine at an arts' supply store, mostly because I *love*
shopping at those kinds of places.

--Danielle
